general_info: U.S. Cellular is the fifth-largest full-service wireless carrier in the United States, providing national network coverage and industry-leading innovations designed to elevate the customer experience. The Chicago-based carrier has a strong line-up of cutting-edge devices that are all backed by a high-quality network in big and small cities and rural communities. Currently, 94 percent of customers have access to 4G LTE speeds. U.S. Cellular was named a J.D. Power and Associates Customer Champion in 2014 for the third time in four years.

CYIOS Corporation s contract vehicles include the Information Management Support Center, Verizon Federal Network Systems and Senior Leadership Division. general_info: ATIS also known as Alliance for Telecommunications for Industry Solutions is located in Washington, D.C. It works to provide worldwide technical and operations standards for information, entertainment and communication technologies. The company conducts more than 20 industry committees and incubator solutions programs and provides opportunities for over 300 companies to participate in the programs. ATIS creates solutions that support the rollout of new products and services into the communications marketplace. Its standardization activities for wireless and wireline networks include interconnection standards, number portability, improved data transmission, Internet telephony, toll-free access, telecom fraud, and order and billing issues. ATIS is accredited by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI).
category: Telecommunications Services, Telephone Companies, Cable & Satellite Television

general_info: United States Telecom Association, located in Washington, D.C., is a trade association representing service providers and suppliers from the telecom industry. The telecom association's more than 1,200 member companies offer a wide range of services, including local exchange, long distance, wireless, Internet and cable television service. Its members provide local telephone service to various companies ranging from large telecom companies, such as Verizon, BellSouth and SBC, to companies with only a few hundred customers. The telecom association advocates for the industry's critical issues before the congress, regulators, courts and the media. It provides a common ground where telecom carriers of all sizes and businesses can advance the industry's concerns. United States Telecom Association's member-driven advocacy program is based on member committees and groups who work to address the issues of the industry.

For more than 40 years, Mathtech innovators have combined analytical thinking with leading-edge technology to help clients solve complex problems. It equips government, business and legal clients with quantifiable answers to problems. The company delivers a variety of services to public and private sector clients through three highly specialized divisions, which include the federal division, which provides systems development and integration services, analytical defense solutions and advanced communications systems to federal government agencies; the state, local and commercial division, which supports state and local governments with custom systems design and implementation services, strategic and systems planning services, systems integration, project management and custom programming; and the economic and litigation consulting division, which provides services for litigation support, specializing in economic and statistical testimony. Mathtech is headquartered in Falls Church, Va.
AT&T, serving over 81 million wireless customers

general_info: You-niversity specializes in webcasting and web conferencing. From video streaming to online training, from everywhere to anywhere, from live simulcasts to on-demand webcasts, we are dedicated to providing our clients with webcasts they can be proud of. We've been in the software business and the training business since 1987. We started our webcast service in 1999 and have executed hundreds of webcast productions since then, long enough to master the nuts and bolts of webcasting. We invite you see case studies of our clients, visit the demos page or explore our free seminars. You-niversity webcast software delivers smooth streaming over both dial up and broadband Internet connections. Our branded interfaces and management system supports and enhances your business. "...what we have is a company dedicated to providing its clients the best webcast software. This is why despite the brutal global economy, we delivered thousands of webcast hours in 2003....We believe You-niversity is different, and one of the things that make us different is that in good times and bad we deliver. That is who we are."

Established in 1981, Fu Associates, Ltd. is one of the leading developers of information management and analysis systems in the United States. Based in Arlington, V., the company provides an array of services, such as systems integration, research, planning and evaluation, human resource consulting and information management services. Industries served by it include health care, aviation, labor, education, environment, agriculture and defense. Fu Associates, Ltd. possesses a vast client base, including Abt Associates Inc., Easter Seals Society, Energy Research Consultants and Federal Aviation Administration, to name a few.

Maden Technologies is a leading integrator of outsourced information technology solutions. The company features a full suite of information assurance services and technology solutions that include identity and access management; operations and security services; network engineering; and security protocols. Other related services encompass the Internet, software and telecommunications. Maden Technologies serves the federal government; state and local governments; private industry; and is a disabled veteran-owned business. Maden Technologies is located in Arlington, Va.

general_info: National Telecommunications Cooperative Association is a nonprofit association that represents more than 500 small and rural telephone cooperatives and commercial companies. It is a full-service association that offers a wide array of member services, including a government affairs program, legal and industry representation, educational services and public relations programs. The firm offers programs designed for managers that include interviewing, conflict resolution, performance evaluations, legal issues and time management skills. It also provides disaster clearinghouse services that include shelter, sleeping mats, blankets, sanitary napkins, a kerosene stove, kerosene, rice, oil for cooking, infant formula and drinking water. The firm has a Foundation for Rural Service, a nonprofit foundation that informs and educates public on the rural telecommunications industry. National Telecommunications Cooperative Association is located in Arlington, Va.

CACI International provides information technology and network solutions for the defense, intelligence and e-government sectors. From systems integration and managed network solutions to knowledge management, engineering, simulation and information assurance, CACI delivers IT applications and infrastructures to federal customers to improve communications and collaboration, secure the integrity of information systems and networks, enhance data collection and analysis and increase efficiency and mission effectiveness. Based in Arlington, Va., CACI International has offices throughout Europe and the United States. CACI was founded in 1962; it became a public company in 1968. It trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol CAI.

Founded in 1997, Convergent Solutions Inc. is an information technology solutions firm. Based in Alexandria, Va., the company offers broad range of services, such as strategic planning, executive management consultation, integrated master schedule, performance metrics development & reporting, application integration, inventory support and many more. Convergent Solutions Inc. is SBA Certified 8a, SBA Certified Small Disadvantaged Business (SDB) and Certified Minority/Women Owned Business. Some of its clients are Defense Information System Agency, Defense Academy of Credibility Assesment (DACA), Department of the Navy, United States Air Force and Defense Intelligence Agency.
